text: Nazim Hussain Siddiqui (Urdu: ; 30 June 1940 - 15 January 2022) was a Pakistani jurist. He was Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Pakistan, from 31 December 2003 to 29 June 2005. He retired from service on 29 June 2005. Siddiqui died on 15 January 2022 in Karachi, Pakistan at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Chief Justices of Pakistan Category:2022 deaths
title: Nazim Hussain Siddiqui
